intro.title: tutorial intro
intro.description: let's discover solo explorer in less than 5 minutes.

tutorial-basics/congratulations.title: congratulations!
tutorial-basics/congratulations.description: you have just learned the basics of solo and made some comments using your pubkey.

tutorial-basics/connect-a-wallet.title: connect a wallet
tutorial-basics/connect-a-wallet.description: connect a wallet to view comment entry field

tutorial-basics/create-a-search.title: create a search
tutorial-basics/create-a-search.description: enter any address, token, pubkey, account, or transaction signature id and press enter

tutorial-basics/view-assets.title: view assets
tutorial-basics/view-assets.description: in the assets tab, and leave comments the same way.

tutorial-basics/view-token.title: view token
tutorial-basics/view-token.description: comment on specific tokens or nfts

tutorial-basics/view-tokens.title: view tokens
tutorial-basics/view-tokens.description: select the tokens tab to view holdings
